title: What is JSX?
content: JSX stands for JavaScript XML. It allows us to write HTML in React.

title: Module 1 Quiz
content: What is the virtual DOM?|A copy of the real DOM kept in memory|A component|A type of hook

title: Managing State
content: State is a plain JavaScript object used by React to represent an information about the component's current situation.

title: useEffect Hook
content: The useEffect hook lets you perform side effects in function components.

title: Creating Personas
content: A persona is a fictional character representing a user type.

title: Low-fidelity vs High-fidelity
content: Low-fidelity focuses on structure, high-fidelity on visual details.
